result.execSummary:
The defendant Shantelis M Wyatt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).
  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Deft. to serve alternate In lieu of costs, 4 days Jail, consecutive to the 90 days imposed sentence.

Straight time (without work release) to commence FORTHWITH.  Sentence credit for 42 days were granted.  In lieu of costs, defendant to serve 4 days Jail consecutive to the 90 days.
Concurrent with: Count 2.
Deft. to serve alternate In lieu of costs, 4 days Jail, consecutive to the 90 days imposed sentence but concurrent to Ct. 1 alternate.

Straight time (without work release) to commence FORTHWITH.  Sentence credit for 42 days were granted.  In lieu of costs, defendant to serve 4 days Jail consecutive to the 90 days.
Concurrent with: Count 1.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shantelis M Wyatt

defendant.name: Wyatt, Shantelis M
defendant.address: 949 North 9th Street, c/o Milwaukee County Jail, Milwaukee, WI 53233

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Shantelis M Wyatt in court, in custody, with attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers.   Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant pleads guilty to counts 1 and 2.  Court finds the defendant guilty of counts 1 and 2.  Case # 15CM183 is dismissed and read into this case.  State makes recommendations.  Attorney Weathers makes statements.  Defendant makes statements.  

The Court Orders the Following: Count #1.  
90 Days Jail without work release concurrent to count #2.  (Credit - 42 days).  Sentence commences immediately.
COSTS:  $243.00, in lieu of costs, defendant to serve 4 days in jail consecutive to the 90 days, concurrent to count #2.    

The Court Orders the Following: Count #2.  
90 Days Jail without work release concurrent to count #1.  (Credit - 42 days).  Sentence commences immediately.
COSTS:  $253.00, in lieu of costs, defendant to serve 4 days in jail consecutive to the 90 days, concurrent to count #1.   

Court orders the return of the defendant to Milwaukee County asap.
Detainer placed at Milwaukee County Jail
Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Defendant to have no contact with witnesses/businesses listed in the Criminal Complaint.

Defendant Shantelis M Wyatt in court, in custody by video conference from Milwaukee County Jail, with attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.   Order to produce from Milwaukee County Jail by 2/29/2016.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 2, 2016 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Shantelis M Wyatt

Prior: 2339 N Booth St, Milwaukee, WI 53212
Defendant Shantelis M Wyatt not in court.  Kevin M. Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
